title: Understanding Implicit Bias
text: Implicit bias refers to the attitudes or stereotypes that affect our understanding, actions, and decisions in an unconscious manner. These biases are not accessible through introspection.

title: Characteristics of Implicit Bias
text: Implicit biases are often automatic and can influence behavior without the individual being aware of it. They are different from explicit biases, which are conscious and deliberate.

hintAnswer: prejudice evidenced in attitudes beyond consciousness or control
title: Defining Implicit Bias
choices: prejudice evidenced in attitudes beyond consciousness or control
>biases that are easily recognized and controlled
